What category does the invention fall in.info: if you choose other, please answer the following question

options: New Use of an existing Process/Product

Describe how this Inention came to be.answer: The invention is a streamlined swimsuit that minimizes resistance and maximizes speed. It was developed by an Olympic swimmer who aimed to improve performance and efficiency in the water. The design provides a balance of flexibility and compression and has the potential to revolutionize the sport of swimming.

Give a detailed description of the Inven.answer: The invention is a revolutionary beauty device that utilizes cutting-edge technology to enhance the absorption of skincare products and improve skin health. It incorporates gentle vibrations and heat therapy to provide users with a youthful glow. The device has multiple customizable settings to cater to different skin types and concerns. With its sleek design and user-friendly interface, it is easy for users to incorporate into their daily skincare routine. The invention has been successfully created and extensively tested during the testing phase, receiving positive feedback. It is set to revolutionize the beauty industry.
